column4: Hi, I'm using Lucid version, does anybody know where are stored repositories? I knew that the list was stored in etc/apt/sources.list. Do you know if exist another?
in that directory theres that file and the sources.list.d
the habbit of altering sources.list is a little outdated.. normally one makes entries one per file in  sources.list.d now
makes it  a MUCh cleaner setup.
not that file. Modification on that file are not correct.
the other grub2 configs are /etc/default/grub and /etc/grub.d/*
because I modified the file remotely I used vi
so I don't know what I did..
perhaps hit google to find a normal default file.. mine is customized for this system. I can pastebinit...
do you have more so on your machine and use 10.04? If so, I would be grateful
is better than nothing. Anyway, thank you
